subHeader: Free and open source mobile app to track watering of your plants

item1.header: One place to keep them all
item1.description: Friendly and simple user interface. Create account and add your plants.

item2.description: Never forget about watering your plant. See your plant's watering history.

item3.description: No subscription, registration or ads. Free and open-source. Forever.

item1.description: To see its watering and images history

item2.description: To edit its details or delete it
